row.name: PCK.AUTOMIC_AZURE.PRV.INCLUDE.BUILD_JAVA_ARGS_MANAGEMENT
row.description: Build Java arguments for azure management services.

row.process:
! Common java arguments :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_AZURE.PRV.INCLUDE.BUILD_JAVA_ARGUMENTS
! Management service arguments : SET &UC4RB_AZR_JAVA_ARGUMENTS# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_AZR_JAVA_ARGUMENTS#, " ") : SET &UC4RB_AZR_JAVA_ARGUMENTS# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_AZR_JAVA_ARGUMENTS#, "-xmsversion") : SET &UC4RB_AZR_JAVA_ARGUMENTS# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_AZR_JAVA_ARGUMENTS#, " ") : SET &UC4RB_AZR_JAVA_ARGUMENTS# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_AZR_JAVA_ARGUMENTS#, "&UC4RB_AZR_X_MS_VERSION#")
